description:
The Rottefella Basic is an easy to use, NIS-mounted touring binding that will appeal to recreational off-trail skiers. The easy, hands-free click in/click out design provides a fast, foolproof method to attach your boots to your bindings.

  • Wide heel piece for increased stability
  • NNN system suits light backcountry touring
name: Rottefella NNN Basic Bindings NIS
